Module Assignment
Package services

Class CampStudentService

java.lang.Object
services.CampStudentService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICampStudentService
public class CampStudentService extends Object implements ICampStudentService
The CampStudentService class implements the ICampStudentService interface and provides services related to camp registration and management.

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableCampsToRegister

      public List<Camp> getAvailableCampsToRegister()
      Retrieves a list of available camps that a student can register for. Restricted based on student's faculty group, camp's visibility to students, and whether slots are still available.
      Specified by:
      getAvailableCampsToRegister in interface ICampStudentService
      Returns:
      a List of Camp objects representing the available camps

    • getAllCamps

      public List<Camp> getAllCamps()
      Retrieves a list of all camps visible to a student. Restricted based on student's faculty group and camp's visibility to students.
      Specified by:
      getAllCamps in interface ICampStudentService
      Returns:
      a List of Camp objects representing all camps

    • getWithdrawnCamps

      public List<Camp> getWithdrawnCamps()
      Retrieves a list of camps from which the student has withdrawn from.
      Specified by:
      getWithdrawnCamps in interface ICampStudentService
      Returns:
      a List of Camp objects representing the withdrawn camps

    • getRegisteredCamps

      public List<Camp> getRegisteredCamps()
      Retrieves a list of camps for which the student is currently registered in.
      Specified by:
      getRegisteredCamps in interface ICampStudentService
      Returns:
      a List of Camp objects representing the registered camps

    • getCampCommitteeCamp

      public Camp getCampCommitteeCamp(Student student)
      Return camp for which the student is currently registered as a Committee Member.
      Specified by:
      getCampCommitteeCamp in interface ICampStudentService
      Parameters:
      student - the Student to find the camp they are registered as a committee member.
      Returns:
      a Camp representing the camp registered by Committee Member.

    • registerCamp

      public boolean registerCamp(Student student, Camp camp)
      Registers the student for a camp based on user input and various checks.
      Specified by:
      registerCamp in interface ICampStudentService
      Parameters:
      student - the Student to register
      camp - the Camp to register for
      Returns:
      true if registration is successful, false otherwise.

    • withdrawCamp

      public boolean withdrawCamp(Student student, Camp camp)
      Handles the withdrawal from a camp for both regular attendees and camp committee members.
      Specified by:
      withdrawCamp in interface ICampStudentService
      Parameters:
      student - the Student to withdraw
      camp - the Camp to withdraw from
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal is successful, false otherwise.

    • registerAsCommittee

      public boolean registerAsCommittee(Student student, Camp camp)
      Registers the student as a camp committee member for a selected camp.
      Specified by:
      registerAsCommittee in interface ICampStudentService
      Parameters:
      student - the Student to register as a Committee Member
      camp - the Camp for which to register as a Committee Member
      Returns:
      true if registration as a committee member is successful, false otherwise.
